Updated. @guozhangwang @dguy

@ewencp, the issue seems to be happening in trunk too: https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-trunk-jdk8/1088/console:

```text
org.apache.kafka.connect.runtime.distributed.DistributedHerderTest > testAccessors STARTED
...
Build timed out (after 360 minutes). Marking the build as failed.
Build was aborted
```

https://github.com/ijuma/kafka/commit/4a6fa974670d65eb6f0873a5131e25c4405cc927

Refer to this link for build results (access rights to CI server needed): 
https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-pr-jdk8-scala2.12/12/

It seems that the issue is related to running the test with JDK 8 and there is more than one failure in the trunk builder. So I'll merge this.

Refer to this link for build results (access rights to CI server needed): 
https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-pr-jdk8-scala2.12/19/

@kkonstantine @ewencp for review

Refer to this link for build results (access rights to CI server needed): 
https://builds.apache.org/job/kafka-pr-jdk8-scala2.11/15/
Test FAILed (JDK 8 and Scala 2.11).
@shikhar maybe we should also introduce a unit test for the invariant you mentioned in the PR description.
A fix for the JDK 8 hang has been proposed by @shikhar: https://github.com/apache/kafka/pull/2232

@xvrl said that my minor tweaks were fine.

LGTM, merged to trunk.
